sen.e: When the disruption of the schedule causes much delay for trains toward Demachiyanagi Station, KER reschedules the timetable by stopping some of those trains at Sanjo Station and turning them back right away in the direction of Osaka, and thereby trying to make a recovery.

When trains to Demachiyanagi Station are delayed due to a disruption of the schedule, KER reschedules the timetable by stopping some trains at Sanjo Station and turning them back immediately, thereby allowing following trains to make up time.
